IncidentDef.letterText: A {PAWN_title} named {PAWN_nameDef} has arrived and is joining the colony waving three beautiful tails.\n\n If you don't want {PAWN_nameDef}, you can banish {PAWN_objective}, sell {PAWN_objective} into slavery, or simply kill {PAWN_objective}.
